docs.title: Welcome to The Joe Project
docs.text:
“Just a guy with too many hobbies and not enough time.”

Welcome to my project wiki — a home for all the things I make, tinker with, or obsess over for way too long. This site is a living archive of my personal builds, mods, experiments, and creative chaos.

docs.title: 🔧 What You'll Find Here
docs.text:
• 3D Printing Projects – Custom accessories, prototypes, tools, and display pieces.
  • Gadget Hacks – Steam Deck mods, DIY electronics, and watch rebuilds.
  • Creative Builds – From mini arcade machines to laser-cut puzzles.
  • Links to Downloads – STL files, code snippets, and how-to diagrams.

If you’re looking for polished instructions or deep dives, check out TheJoeProject.info — this wiki will point you there when needed.

docs.title: 📁 Project Highlights
docs.text:
Explore some of my most recent or favorite builds:

  • Mini Air Hockey Table
  • Steam Deck Arcade Dock
  • Synoke Watch Mod

Thanks for stopping by — now let’s go make something.

docs.title: About The Joe Project
docs.text:
Hi! I’m Joe — just a guy with too many hobbies and not enough time.

I started The Joe Project as a way to document, share, and celebrate the creative rabbit holes I dive into. Whether I’m modding my Steam Deck, designing a 3D-printed arcade cabinet, or just figuring out a better way to store cables, this site is where it all lives.

docs.title: 🧰 What I Love Doing
docs.text:
• Tinkering with gadgets and gear
  • Printing weird, useful, or just fun things
  • Playing and streaming games (and sometimes building stuff live)
  • Sharing what I learn as I go — the wins and the screw-ups

docs.title: 🧭 Why This Exists
docs.text: This wiki isn’t just a build log — it’s a creative outlet. It’s for folks like me who love making stuff, solving problems, and trying things just to see if they’ll work.

docs.title: 🤝 Get Involved
docs.text:
Have an idea? Want to remix one of my builds? Just want to say hi?

  • Catch me live on Twitch
  • Browse updates and Shorts on YouTube
  • DM me on Instagram

Thanks for being here!

The Joe Project is fueled by curiosity, caffeine, and one too many browser tabs.

docs.title: Overview
docs.text: A tiny air hockey table made with a 3D printer and a laptop fan.

docs.title: Overview
docs.text: A custom-built arcade dock for the Steam Deck with retro gaming vibes.

docs.title: Overview
docs.text: A modded Synoke watch with custom gel insert and case cleanup.
